2025-10-20T17:20:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to hoisting of Strong Wind Signal No. 3 and the associated wet weather, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. pay attention to the special traffic and transport arrangements may be implemented; ii. pay attention to the possible traffic congestions of the roads; iii. plan the journey in advance; iv. allow more traveling time to cater for delay; v. drive with extra care and patience; and vi. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-10-20T17:20:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於三號強風信號現正生效、天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.留意當局可能會實施特別的交通及運輸措施； ii.留意在個別道路可能會出現交通擠塞的情況； iii.提早計劃行程路線； iv.預留充裕時間出門； v.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 vi.特别留意視線受阻的交通繁忙路口。

2025-10-21T09:13:00.CONTENT_EN: Ting Kau Bridge: Due to strong wind, Stage 1 temporary traffic arrangements are implemented on Ting Kau Bridge: (i) The middle lanes of Ting Kau Bridge are closed. Only fast and slow lanes are opened to traffic. Speed limit is reduced to 50km/h. (ii) Except vehicles with overall height not exceeding 1.6 meters (e.g. lower-height private cars and taxis), all vehicles (including motorcycles and motor tricycles) are prohibited from using Ting Kau Bridge. Members of the public are advised to watch out for the latest traffic news through radio and television broadcasts, and for the traffic signs on site.
2025-10-21T09:13:00.CONTENT_CN: 汀九橋： 由於強風關係，汀九橋已實施第一階段臨時交通措施： (i)汀九橋的中線封閉，只餘快線及慢線開放予車輛行駛，車速限制降至每小時50公里。 (ii)除1.6米或以下的車輛（例如較矮身的私家車及的士）外，所有車輛（包括電單車及機動三輪車）禁止使用汀九橋。 市民請留意電台/電視廣播的最新交通消息，以及現場的交通標誌。

2025-10-21T12:35:00.CONTENT_EN: Ting Kau Bridge: The temporary speed limit arrangement which was implemented before in the Ting Kau Bridge is cancelled. Members of the public are advised to watch out for the latest traffic news through radio and television broadcasts, and for the traffic signs on site.
2025-10-21T12:35:00.CONTENT_CN: 汀九橋： 較早前於汀九橋實施的臨時車速限制措施現已取消。 市民請留意電台/電視廣播的最新交通消息，以及現場的交通標誌。

2025-10-21T09:35:00.CONTENT_EN: Members of the public heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that the cycle track and footpath of the Cross Bay Bridge are going to be closed soon due to high wind. Please use alternative route for travelling to LOHAS Park and Tiu Keng Leng.
2025-10-21T09:35:00.CONTENT_CN: 前往跨灣大橋人士請注意，因強風，跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路即將封閉。請改用其他單車徑及行人路前往日出康城及調景嶺。

2025-10-21T11:00:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following arrangements have been implemented on cycle track and footpath of Cross Bay Bridge at Tseung Kwan O: Members of the public heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that the cycle track and footpath of the Cross Bay Bridge have been closed due to high wind. Please use alternative route for travelling to LOHAS Park and Tiu Keng Leng.
2025-10-21T11:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 因強風，將軍澳跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路現已實施下列安排: 前往跨灣大橋人士請注意，因強風，跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路已經封閉。請改用其他單車徑及行人路前往日出康城及調景嶺。

2025-10-21T20:19:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to malfunction of traffic lights at the junction of Hoi Wong Road and Hoi Wing Road, motorists are advised to drive with utmost care when passing through the road junctions, pay extra attention to the traffic signs and safety of pedestrians. Pedestrians please pay attention to vehicles when crossing junctions with malfunctioned traffic lights.
2025-10-21T20:19:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於海皇路和海榮路交界的交通燈失靈，駕駛人士在駛經有關路口時，請加倍小心，注意交通標誌的指示並留意過路行人的安全。行人在交通燈失靈的路口橫過馬路時，請特別注意車輛。

2025-10-21T21:32:00.CONTENT_EN: The traffic lights at the junction of Hoi Wong Road and Hoi Wing Road have resumed normal.
2025-10-21T21:32:00.CONTENT_CN: 位於海皇路和海榮路交界的交通燈已恢復正常運作。

2025-10-21T21:20:00.CONTENT_EN: Under the combined effect of spring tide and the northeast monsoon, the following pedestrian subway along Sha Tin Shing Mun River has been closed by the Highway Department: Connecting Tai Chung Kiu Road and Shing Mun River riverside NS35(near Belair Garden) Pedestrians please take note of the above arrangement, and consider using other roads.
2025-10-21T21:20:00.CONTENT_CN: 受天文大潮及東北季候風的共同影響，路政署已封閉以下位於沙田城門河沿岸的行人隧道: 連接大涌橋路與城門河畔 NS35(近富豪花園) 行人請注意上述安排，並改用其他道路。

2025-10-22T00:09:00.CONTENT_EN: The following pedestrian subway along Sha Tin Shing Mun River is now reopened: Connecting Tai Chung Kiu Road and Shing Mun River riverside NS35(near Belair Garden)
2025-10-22T00:09:00.CONTENT_CN: 以下位於沙田城門河沿岸的行人隧道已經重開: 連接大涌橋路與城門河畔 NS35(近富豪花園)
